org.echo.mobile.framework.support.crypto

Class EdDSASignature

    Object used to transaction EdDSA signing

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<kotlin.Array[]> signTransaction(Transaction transaction)
      Obtains a signature of transaction. Please note that due to the fact that it uses deterministic EdDSA signatures, we are slightly modifying the expiration time of the transaction while we look for a signature that will be accepted by the graphene network.

    • Field Detail

      • SIGN_DATA_BYTES

        public static int SIGN_DATA_BYTES

        public static EdDSASignature INSTANCE

        Object used to transaction EdDSA signing

    • Method Detail

      • signTransaction

        public static java.util.ArrayList<kotlin.Array[]> signTransaction(Transaction transaction)

        Obtains a signature of transaction. Please note that due to the fact that it uses deterministic EdDSA signatures, we are slightly modifying the expiration time of the transaction while we look for a signature that will be accepted by the graphene network.

        This should then be called before any other serialization method.

        Returns:
        : A valid signature of the transaction.
